headline.main: Wells Fargo CFO Says Has Not Considered Giving Back Recent Bonuses
headline.print_headline: Wells Fargo CFO Says Has Not Considered Giving Back Recent Bonuses

docs.snippet: Wells Fargo & Co CFO John Shrewsberry said on Friday he has not considered giving back bonuses he has earned following a scandal over unauthorized accounts....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo & Co CFO John Shrewsberry said on Friday he has not considered giving back bonuses he has earned following a scandal over unauthorized accounts.

headline.main: Gundlach Says Yellen Speech Suggests Accommodative Fed for Longer
headline.print_headline: Gundlach Says Yellen Speech Suggests Accommodative Fed for Longer

docs.snippet: Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen's speech on Friday on running a “high pressure” economy with a tight labor market to reverse some of the negative effects of the Great Recession of 2008 suggests the U.S. central bank will stay accomm...
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen's speech on Friday on running a “high pressure” economy with a tight labor market to reverse some of the negative effects of the Great Recession of 2008 suggests the U.S. central bank will stay accommodative for longer, according to Jeffrey Gundlach, chief executive of DoubleLine Capital.

headline.main: Sticking With Stocks, Especially in Market Downturns

docs.lead_paragraph: Mutual fund managers are holding their ground, which may be a stabilizing force in the market.

headline.main: As Marine Parks Scale Back, Dolphin Exhibit Opens in Arizona

headline.main: Home Where MLK Once Lived Avoids Demolition, to Be Repaired

headline.main: Court Orders New Trial for Lawyer Convicted in Gambling Ring
headline.print_headline: Court Orders New Trial for Lawyer Convicted in Gambling Ring

docs.lead_paragraph: An attorney convicted of leading a $300 million gambling ring that used a veterans charity as a front and led to the resignation of Florida's lieutenant governor is getting a new trial.

headline.main: How Regular Investing Smooths the Market’s Ups and Downs
headline.print_headline: Regular Investing Smooths the Market’s Ups and Downs

docs.snippet: Dollar-cost averaging offers investors a way to avoid the risks of trying to time the markets, and to save gradually, at a reasonable price....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dollar-cost averaging offers investors a way to avoid the risks of trying to time the markets, and to save gradually, at a reasonable price.
